item.title: Something About Emacs
item.description: In this series, I will write something about Emacs.

item.title: start a new blog
item.description: generate ssh-keygen For more information, please refer to this. Î» ssh-keygen -t rsa -b 4096 -C "thanks_music163@163.com" Add public key to github install Emacs package ox-hugo (use-package ox-hugo :ensure t :after ox) Refer to document ox-hugo. install hugo brew update; and brew install hugo Read the document about Hugo. Learn some basic terms and knowledge about Hugo. Refer to this. read others’ configuration
